meanings.sent1: I will ingather all the toys before bedtime.

meanings.definition: The act of gathering or collecting together.
meanings.sent1: The ingather of friends for the party was a success.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the ingather of colorful leaves in the park.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected ingather of birds in the garden surprised us.
meanings.sent4: The ingather of books on the shelf made the room cozy.
meanings.sent5: The community celebrated the ingather of donations for charity.
